**Notes on rasters taken whilst reading the [Spatial Data Science with R and terra](<https://rspatial.org/index.html>) online resources**

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(
  suppressWarnings(
    library(terra),
    library(tmap)
  )
)
```

## Raster layer

### Load raster

```{r}
example_raster <- rast(system.file("extdata/tif_files/example_raster.tif", 
                                   package = "store"))
tm_shape(example_raster) +
  tm_raster(palette = "Blues", style = "cont", legend.show = FALSE)
```
